---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea or improvement. Requests are welcome; implementation is not guaranteed.
title: "[Feature] <brief summary>"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

Note: Feature requests are fine. The maintainer may only implement them if they seem like a good idea and time/interest allows. PRs proposing small, focused changes are welcome.

## Summary
What do you want to add or improve? Keep it concise and technical.

## Motivation / Use Case
Why is this useful here? Describe the concrete problem or benefit.

## Proposed Change
Describe the smallest viable change. Avoid broad refactors or large scope.

## Alternatives (optional)
List any alternatives you considered and tradeoffs.

## Scope / Impact
Briefly note user impact, risk, and any configuration/docs updates needed.

## Willing to Implement?
- [ ] Yes — I can submit a PR
- [ ] No — just sharing the idea
